name: Weed's out of control
description:
Weed's out of control it our submission for GMTK 2020

It's a farming game where you have to plant your crop, water it and harvest it to earn points. all while defending your terrain from the evil ever growing weeds.
The system is Wave based so let's see how high you can score!!

Use AWSD to navigate.

Spacebar to use your tool or plant a seed.

1 and 2 for your tools.

This is our first finished game.

All feedback welcome!

credits:
